description:
Company Profile

At CAVA, we make it deliciously simple to eat well and feel good every day. We are guided by a Mediterranean heritage that’s been perfecting how to eat and live for four thousand years.

We prioritize authenticity, curiosity and the pursuit of excellence in everything we do. We are working towards something big , together.

We Foster a Culture Built On Five Core Values

Generosity First : We lead with kindness. Our best work happens when we act in service of others.Constant Curiosity : We are eager to learn, grow, and explore beyond the obvious.

Act with Agility : We welcome change; it’s the only constant. We embrace, adjust, adapt.Passion for Positivity : We greet each day with warmth and possibility.

Collective Ambition : We have high aspirations that are achieved when we work together with a shared purpose.

Senior Marketing Manager Growth And Expansion

As the Senior Marketing Manager of Growth and Expansion at Cava, you will be a vital architect in advancing our mission and future-proofing the Cava business by developing and spearheading strategic marketing initiatives that resonate with our core values.

We need someone with more spice and heart that our iconic Skhug sauce, because this role is not just about promoting the Cava brand;

it's about fostering a connection with communities, inspiring a love for Mediterranean flavors, and contributing to a healthier, more inclusive world through the language of food.

This role will have a direct and measurable impact on KPIs (for example, growing YOY Harissa Avocado Bowls sold in a new market) as you lead efforts to launch new restaurants, enter untapped markets, and explore expanding business verticals.

Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, you will be at the forefront of ensuring successful restaurant launches and sustained growth.

Oh, and did we mention, as a Cava employee, you will enjoy the perks of eating Cava for free?!

What You’ll Do

Market Research, Entry Strategy, Localization

Conduct market research to identify new market opportunities and analyze market trends, consumer behavior and competition in expansion areasComplete competitive analysis for each market, identify competitive advantage opportunities and tactics.

Marketing Strategy and Toolkit

Develop comprehensive entry market strategy and toolkit with local brand positioning.Develop marketing timelines and road maps tailored to local markets and new restaurants for pre, during, and post opening.

Identify target demographics and design integrated campaigns to engage demo target, build brand awareness and drive traffic.

Develop an integrated marketing toolkit for new restaurants and ongoing programming such as printed materials, ATL and BTL paid media, events, and partnerships.

Implement strategy to effectively communicate Cava’s value proposition to the local audiences.

Partnership and Community Development

Develop a brand partnerships strategy for both national and local partnershipsIdentify and establish mutually beneficial partnerships with regional businesses, influencers, events and non-profitsDevelop Community Day Strategy and Tool-KitDevelop an evergreen, ongoing fundraiser program with integrated marketing materials and a cohesive customer experience for national launch.

Create events and partnerships budget, secure events and partnerships that are on-brand and develop integrated experiential activation.

Monitor performance of events, partnerships and fundraisers and share post-analysis reports.

Brand Ambassador Program

Develop Brand Ambassador Program as it relates to strategy, roles, responsibilities, marketing materials, merchandise and rewards.

Recruit and onboard Cava campus ambassadors, monitor activities and execution.Develop calendar of campus events, monitor performance, share post analysis.

Main contact and lead for all campus ambassadors

The Qualifications
• 7-9 years of marketing experience, preferably in restaurant or hospitality industryA bachelor's degree in marketing, business, or a related field;
• Advanced degrees or certifications a plusSeveral years of experience in strategic marketing developing and implementing marketing strategies for business growthProven track record in developing and managing national and local brand partnerships;

experience in negotiating and establishing mutually beneficial partnerships with various entities

Physical Requirements

Ability to maintain stationary position to be able to operate a computer and other office equipment.Must be able to identify, analyze and assess details.

For certain positions, must be able to occasionally move or transport items up to 50 pounds.Ability to communicate with others and exchange information accurately and effectively.

Constantly positions self and move about to support ordinary restaurant or food production support or office operations, as applicable.

Ability to work in a constant state of alertness and in a safe manner.

What We Offer

CAVA Joining A culture, not a concept

As an equal opportunity employer, CAVA considers applicants for all positions without regard to race, color, sex, religion, national origin, disability, age, height, weight, marital status, sexual orientation, familial status, genetic information or any other characteristic or protected classes as defined by federal, state, or local law.
